text:
seven years imprisonment for chopping off the hand of a farmer. The accused Satishkumar (23) and Sambasivam (24) were involved in a land dispute with the victim Chinnathambi (46) of Madhiyampatti in Pochampalli. On the day of the incident in October 2014, the accused had confronted Chinnathambi in his agricultural land. The two took out a cleaver and chopped off the hand of Chinnathambi.

The Additional Sessions Judge also imposed a fine of Rs.7,500 each.
title: Two get seven years imprisonment
